   -128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128),
  (11,24,  // Ascii 87
    2,21, 7, 0,-128,-128,12,21, 7, 0,-128,-128,12,21,17, 0,-128,-128,22,21,17, 0,-128,
   -128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,

  (5,20,  // Ascii 88
    3,21,17, 0,-128,-128,17,21, 3, 0,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,
   -128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,
   -128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128),
  (6,18,  // Ascii 89
    1,21, 9,11, 9, 0,-128,-128,17,21, 9,11,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,
   -128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,
   -128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128),
  (8,20,  // Ascii 90
   17,21, 3, 0,-128,-128, 3,21,17,21,-128,-128, 3, 0,17, 0,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,
   -128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,
   -128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128),
  (11,14,  // Ascii 91
    4,25, 4,-7,-128,-128, 5,25, 5,-7,-128,-128, 4,25,11,25,-128,-128, 4,-7,11,-7,-128,
   -128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,

    0,21,14,-3,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,

   -128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128),

    9,25, 9,-7,-128,-128,10,25,10,-7,-128,-128, 3,25,10,25,-128,-128, 3,-7,10,-7,-128,
   -128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,-128,
